title: Entregador de Flor - Ao Vivo em Brasília
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Vai lá entregador de flor
lines.translation: Go ahead, flower delivery man!
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'Go ahead, flower delivery man!'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Dar assistência pra isso
lines.translation: To provide assistance for that.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'To provide assistance for that.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Que eu e ela tá chamando de amor
lines.translation: What she and I are calling love.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: chamando (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'What she and I are calling love.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: E o coração se acostumou
lines.translation: And the heart got used to it.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: acostumou (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'And the heart got used to it.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Que de sete em sete dias
lines.translation: That every seven days
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: sete (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'That every seven days'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Eu mando um novo, por que o outro murchou
lines.translation: I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: mando, murchou (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Pra não dar tempo dela me esquecer
lines.translation: So she doesn't have time to forget me.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: esquecer (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'So she doesn't have time to forget me.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Toda semana eu mando um buquê
lines.translation: Every week I send a bouquet.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: mando (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'Every week I send a bouquet.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.
